name: The HARDEST BrickBreaker
description: This is a very special brick-breaking game! You can rotate the paddle or hit balls to make the balls resist gravity to break the annoying bricks. The bricks will also move around and try them best to annoy you! This game will definitely bring you the most crazy brick-breaking experience!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel 3000+ Storage: 80 MB available space
